sources.title: 1955 - Female on the Beach - Una mujer en la playa - Joseph Pevney - VOSE
sources.description: For Academic / Educational Use Only derechonoir.wordpress.com

metadata.Plot: Lynn Markham moves into her late husband's beach house...the morning after former tenant Eloise Crandall fell (or was pushed) from the cliff. To her annoyance, Lynn finds both her real estate agent and Drummond Hall, her muscular beachcomber neighbor, making themselves quite at home. Lynn soon has no doubts of what her scheming neighbors are up to, but she finds Drummond's physical charms hard to resist. And she still doesn't know what really happened to Eloise.
metadata.Writer: Robert Hill, Richard Alan Simmons, Albert Zugsmith
metadata.Actors: Joan Crawford, Jeff Chandler, Jan Sterling
